title: Understanding the 4C's of Culture
text: The 4C's of Culture are a framework used to understand a client's cultural perspective on their health issues.

title: First C: Consideration
text: The first C stands for what the client Considers to be a problem. This involves understanding the client's perspective on their health issue.

title: Second C: Cause
text: The second C is about the Cause of the problem. It involves exploring what the client believes is causing their health issue.

title: Third C: Coping
text: The third C refers to how the client is Coping with the problem. This includes the strategies they are using to manage their health issue.

title: Fourth C: Concern
text: The fourth C is about how Concerned the client is about the problem. This involves assessing the level of worry or anxiety the client has regarding their health issue.
